abstract.t: This document defines the initial version of the iana-timezone YANG module.

section.title: Introduction
section.t: This document defines the initial version of the iana-timezone YANG module for timezone configuration.
The iana-timezones module reflects IANA's existing "timezone database". The latest revision of the module can be obtained from the IANA web site.
Whenever a new timezone name is added to the IANA "timezone database", the iana-timezones module is updated by IANA.<

section.title: IANA Considerations
section.t: This document defines the initial version of the IANA-maintained iana-timezones YANG module.

The iana-timezones module is intended to reflect the IANA "timezone database". When a timezone location is added to the database, a new "enum" statement must be added to the "iana-timezone" typedef, with the same name as the newly added timezone location.
When the iana-timezones YANG module is updated, a new "revision" statement must be added.
This document registers one URI in the IETF XML registry [RFC3688]. Following the format in RFC 3688, the following registration is requested to be made.

list.t: XML: N/A, the requested URI is an XML namespace.

section.t: This document registers one YANG module in the YANG Module Names registry [RFC6020].

section.title: Security Considerations
section.t: Since this document does not introduce any technology or protocol, there are no security issues to be considered for this document itself.
